attributes.action: Petition to get MPs not to debate and discuss this petition
attributes.additional_details: If 100,000 people sign this petition then MPs will be forced to discuss not discussing this petition. There is no real point to this petition other than to show the pointlessness of this new petition system. If this petition recieves 100,000 signatures i want the government to discuss the pointlessness of this petition, preferably having in a COBRA meeting or something....  I will actually be pleased if 10 people sign this petition in all honesty...
